title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Right & wrong, Jon Gruden
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR-2-Right & wrong, Jon Gruden
description:
Colin explains where he was right and wrong and gives his thoughts on Jon Gruden's recent comments on Marcus Mariota.

Guests: Kevin O'Connor, Albert Breer.
